text: Hunan (; ) is a province of South Central China, in the middle reaches of the Yangtze River and south of Lake Dongting (The characters in the name Hunan mean "lake" and "south" Origin of the Names of China's Provinces , People's Daily Online.). Hunan is sometimes called æ¹˜ () for short, after the Xiang River which runs through the province. Its major cities are Changde, Changsha, Chenzhou, Hengyang, Huaihua, Loudi, Shaoyang, Xiangtan, Yiyang, Yongzhou, Yueyang, Zhangjiajie and Zhuzhou. ==References==
title: Hunan
